blogPost.excerpt: Sonos’s smartest and most versatile speaker sounds incredible for its size, is effortless to set up and control, and packs new innovation into a premium, lightweight, and durable design.
blogPost.body: Sonos’s smartest and most versatile speaker sounds incredible for its size, is effortless to set up and control, and packs new innovation into a premium, lightweight, and durable design.
blogPost.title: Sonos Roam - A portable, waterproof speaker from Sonos
blogPost.author: Calum Webb

localize.description: Sonos 最聪明、功能最全面的扬声器，以其尺寸而言，听起来令人难以置信，设置和控制起来毫不费力，并在优质、轻巧、耐用的设计中融入新的创新。
localize.tagline: 来自Sonos的便携式防水扬声器

localize.description: Sonos 最聰明、功能最全面的揚聲器，以其尺寸而言，聽起來令人難以置信，設置和控制起來毫不費力，並在優質、輕巧、耐用的設計中融入新的創新。
localize.tagline: 來自Sonos的便攜式防水揚聲器

localize.full_text:
拉里-萨默斯的经济概率。

经济衰退的可能性为40%

40%的机会，一切正常

40%的机会出现滞胀

40%的机会出现恶性通货膨胀

40%的机会出现高通胀

40%的可能性是冈萨加全胜

40%的機會出現高通脹
